name: 7th Edition of International Conference on Catalysis, Chemical Engineering and Technology
content: Magnus Group is proud to announce that 7th Edition of International Conference on Catalysis, Chemical Engineering and Technology, which is going to be held at Tokyo, Japan during May 17-18, 2021\. CCT 2021 conference aims to bring together foremost researchers, academic scientists and research scholars to interchange and share their experiences and research results on all facets of Catalysis and Chemical Engineering. This event also offers the best interdisciplinary stage for educators, practitioners and researchers to present and talk over the modern innovations, trends, and concerns as well as practical challenges encountered and solutions adopted in these fields.
